title: Shiv Sagar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Indian, International, Western, Delivery, Take-out, Indo-Chinese
description: Pure vegetarian restaurant with an extensive menu that includes North Indian, South Indian, Indo-Chinese as well western dishes like pizza, veggie burgers, and baked potatoes. Will prepare Jain food on request. The front room is a cafe, and the back room is nicer with ambiance and finer furnishings. It's located on a tree-lined street with wide side-walks and bus service, 1/2 block from Churchgate railroad station.
streetAddress: 82 Nagin Mahal, Veer Nariman Road, Churchgate
